comment._content: Love the picture quality! love the music! Txtual Healing is pretty cool as well. Nice one guys.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Yeah, the quality is amazing, isn't it? - Flickr did a fantastic job with video. Take a look at the same video on YouTube and you can really see the difference.

comment.author: 24318289@N07
comment._content: Yup, this is the coolest installation of digital communication, combined with a museum's exhibit.  Flickr's compression abilities are amazing. Real (Art )Talk. Sending Brooklyn love from the home of Elvis aka Memphis! Keep on innovatin'!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Woo hoo!  Elvis is awesome - thanks for sayin' hi :) -shelley
